title: Kristen Stewart bares her tanned legs in cut-off denim shorts while on a coffee run in Los Angeles
text:
Her new movie, Charlie's Angels, is set to debut next month.

And in the mean time, Kristen Stewart proved she was taking some time out to relax before the intense press tour.

The 29-year-old actress looked at ease as she was spotted on a coffee run Saturday morning while out in Los Angeles.

Scroll down for video

Casual: Kristen Stewart was spotted heading out solo on Saturday morning to pick up some coffee. The 29-year-old was dressed in a casual T-shirt and Daisy Duke shorts

Kristen showed off her casual weekend ensemble wearing a striped red-and-blue T-shirt for the morning outing.

She teamed the look with Daisy Duke shorts that featured distressed threads along her thighs.

The Twilight star completed her leggy display by adding a pair of tan slides to her look.

Legs eleven! The Twilight actress completed her leggy display by adding a pair of tan slides to her look

No stress look: Kristen opted to keep her short blonde hair out naturally and appeared to be makeup free for the outing

Kristen opted to keep her short blonde hair out naturally and appeared to be makeup free for the outing.

The beauty's appearance comes ahead of her debut in the upcoming Charlie's Angels reboot alongside Naomi Scott and Ella Ballinksa.

The franchise was rebooted for the big screen with 2000's Charlie's Angels, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu, who all returned along with Demi Moore for the 2003 sequel Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle.

New angels! Kristen's appearance comes ahead of her debut in the upcoming Charlie's Angels reboot alongside Naomi Scott and Ella Ballinksa

There was also a return to the small screen with the 2011 Charlie's Angels, starring Annie Ilonzeh, Minka Kelly and Rachael Taylor.

The first trailer for the most recent iteration was released in June and in addition to the leading ladies, star's Hollywood hunks Sam Claflin and Noah Centineo.

Last month, Miley Cyrus, Ariana Grande and Lana del Rey debuted an original song, Don't Call Me Angel, for the flick and the singers also have cameos in the movie.

Disguised: At one point in the new trailer, Kristen is seen wearing a blonde wig

Original angels: The franchise was rebooted for the big screen with 2000's Charlie's Angels, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu, who all returned along with Demi Moore for the 2003 sequel Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle

Ariana revealed the full movie soundtrack earlier this week on social media, which will be out on November 1.

'The charlie’s angels soundtrack is available for preorder now ! excited and honored to have so many phenomenal, bad a*s mf women involved in this incredibly special project.

'we’re all so excited for you to hear this poppy, mildly trappy at times, action filled, dream of a soundtrack. these songs are so right for this film!

'this has been such a unique and exciting experience for me and i’m so excited to see it and scream whenever i hear all my friends’ voices.'
